name: playwright-automation-framework
description: Playwright automation framework in JavaScript (ES modules)

scripts.pretest: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['allure-results', 'allure-report'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} })"
scripts.allure:clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['allure-results', 'allure-report'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, { recursive: true, force: true }); } catch(e) {} })"
scripts.allure:serve: allure generate allure-results --clean -o allure-report && allure open allure-report
